name: glintz-travel-app
description: Glintz - Production-ready mobile travel discovery app with swipe-based hotel browsing

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../app && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build:api && cd api && npm start
scripts.ios:build: cd app && npx expo run:ios --configuration Release
scripts.clean: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:app
scripts.clean:ios: cd app && rm -rf ios/build ios/Pods && cd ios && pod install
scripts.test: echo "Tests will be added in future versions"
scripts.lint: echo "Linting will be added in future versions"

author: Glintz Team
